# K mean clustering {#k-means}


Make clusters from points.


```{r}

library(palmerpenguins)
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
```

Perform the calculations


```{r}
penguins_no_na <- penguins %>% na.omit()
kclust <- kmeans(penguins_no_na %>% select(bill_length_mm, bill_depth_mm, flipper_length_mm, body_mass_g) %>% as.matrix() %>% scale(),
                 centers = 3)
kclust
kc1 <- augment(kclust, penguins_no_na)
tidy(kclust)
ggplot(kc1, aes(x=bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm, color=.cluster, shape=species)) + geom_point()
```
